website_summaries.verdict: Another popular option for those looking for a mattress cover that offers high-quality construction and materials.
pros: Hypoallergenic and waterproof construction that blocks bed bugs, dust mites, allergens, bacteria, and mildew

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof at all
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after my 9 year old puppy started having kidney problems. He spends most of the day on the bed when I'm not home. After he had his second accident on the bed I decided to look for a cover that was waterproof, but also comfortable. After about a month on the bed, today he had another accident. Urine soaked right through as if it was made of tissue paper. Zero stoppage. Complete waste of $45.00.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Mold
customer_reviews.text: The terry cloth top was a little bit of an odd choice, but so far it seems fine. No immediate quality issues. Update: My toddler likes to sleep with a blanket on, even when it is warm. Therefore he sweats a lot while sleeping. I went to wash his sheets and found mold in the terry cloth under the pillow area. Not a good quality for an item trying to help reduce allergens. I regret not realizing that this cover had a terry cloth surface before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when zipping. It fits so well so zipping is a bit of a challenge but you’ll manage it.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this yesterday and so my review will only be for the fabric quality and easy installation. It was so easy, did it by myself in less than 5mins, and slipped smoothly into my brand new 12-inch mattress. Snugged so perfectly and no bulky/wrinkly fitting. I like the fabric, it’s real fabric and not plastic so it doesn’t make any sound when you’re in bed. I have yet to see how durable it is, though. I washed it before installing, fearing it might shrink. It didn’t. Just set on cold water and low dry.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Lozano

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: zipper broke and my son's mattress is ruined with multiple urine leak throughs. It did not work as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Viva La Vida

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t keep out bed bugs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my new mattress after having a bed bug situation. I didn’t even take the plastic off the mattress until this was delivered so I know I didn’t transfer any bugs. A year later, we have another bug problem and once I upzipped this cover, I discovered one corner INSIDE completely covered in evidence of bed bugs living inside there. So it didn’t keep them out. They found a way in. So I didn’t even bother washing it. I threw it away and bought a different brand to see if it works better.
customer_reviews.author: Anna R Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this product !!!
customer_reviews.text: Only negative issue was the zipper. The slide came off the zipper second time I remove the mattress protector. This is very disappoint especially for the cost of this item. Further, it's a struggle put the slide back on. Very disappointed and cannot recommend this product. Update, slider broke. Now I have to purchase another mattress protector (different brand).
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Very impractical, inconvenient and not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money. It may be "100% waterproof" but it's also completely fabric-coated on the outside. So if your kid has an accident on it, you have to take it completely off, which means taking the mattress off the bed and sliding the cover off. Not exactly convenient at 2:00 in the morning. The description leads you to believe that it's some sort of plastic cover that could be wiped down with a cloth and some cleaner, but in reality you would have to machine wash it after any (and every) accident. I hope you enjoy my $40. Thanks for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: cunningwill

customer_reviews.title: It looks good. not plastic
customer_reviews.text: It looks good. not plastic. A person sleeping on it won't know it's there. I am a senior plus and didn't have any trouble putting it on, a little juggling. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Foster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a thinner mattress
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a mattress cover for the grandkids bunk beds, but all of them that I looked at said they would fit mattresses 12-15 inches thick. Ours is only 7 inches thick, so I knew these would be WAY too big for my mattresses. Then I found this one and it fits PERFECTLY. While being waterproof, the material is soft and doesn't make noise and the top is also a nice soft terry like material. It covers the entire mattress and zips closed at one end. The zipper seems sturdy and the entire cover well made. I am extremely pleased with this purchase, it is just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: elzora

customer_reviews.title: They fit nice look good and they work !!
customer_reviews.text: The issue I had is we went on vacation for a week and brought back hitch hikers it was bed bugs kept going through By By Bugs and the next thing you knew they were back seems like you cannot get them all . So instead of throwing out a 1200.00 mattress and box spring I went through taking apart cleaning of the entire bed and I sprayed the mattress and box spring down one last time and installed the covers on the mattress and box spring nothing since! Thank You so much its sealed !!!
customer_reviews.author: michael strine

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to use (for me)
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I didn't realize how inconvenient the "installation" was until I looked th the back of the product and saw the instructions and illustrations on how to put it on the bed. You have to stand the mattress upright with the help of another person to slide it onto the mattress. Unfortunately, I will have to return the product since 1 - I don't have anyone to help with this and 2 - it means that each time the product need to be washed it has to be taken off the mattress by standing it upright and then, after washing and drying the process has to be repeated. Sorry - this is too much trouble for a 70+ lady!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. Weak zipper.
customer_reviews.text: Weak zipper. Washed for first time and now zipper won't close. Let's see about this 10 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: sam beck

customer_reviews.title: SOOO Hard to put on mattress
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy an encasement mattress protector again. I fought to put It on the mattress by myself the first time. After washing it, I decided to remove the mattress to the living room where there is more maneuvering space. I asked my husband to help. But figuring out the positioning while it is unzipped is not easy for one thing. Then lifting the mattress this way and that on its edge makes it maddening to deal with. I pulled a muscle in my arm and tomorrow have to go to a shoulder specialist. So no, I don't recommend this style of mattress cover/protector.
customer_reviews.author: Gunslingerfire

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this product but so far I am loving it. I was skeptical about my ability to put it on the the bed by myself but it was very easy considering I have a pinched nerve. I purchase the queen with 13 to 16 inch, it fit my mattress perfectly it was easy to zip. My only recommendation would be the manufacturer extends the length of the material around the zipper or that they sew the material down. it I love the hidden zipper and the way that it was designed for you to tuck in the end of the zipper into a little velcro pocket. Will buy another for my full bed , recommended
customer_reviews.author: Betty K.

customer_reviews.title: They look OK though and just what we ordered as the bottom mattress came at 8'' the top bunk mattress came as a 6"" so these will be perfect. It took us ages to find just the ...
customer_reviews.text: These took a little longer than usual to arrive in fact we forgot about them as we won't be using them till next summer on our new bunk beds bought for grand kids visiting. They look OK though and just what we ordered as the bottom mattress came at 8'' the top bunk mattress came as a 6"" so these will be perfect.It took us ages to find just the right sizes in our home stores non of them sold bunk bed size mattress covers only deep twin which would have constantly moved under the sheet.
customer_reviews.author: anne Brook

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I wish I had read more of the reviews before purchasing this product. I saw it was an "Amazon's Choice". However, it has not been our experience that it is waterproof at all. If you're only looking for an encasing for dust mites, it will probably do the trick. (Although you still have to take care when zipping or it will tear.) If you're looking for something "waterproof", look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Smith

customer_reviews.title: difficult to set up
customer_reviews.text: note this is NOT cover mattress pad....instructions are to take the kingsize mattress off the bed and set it next to the wall ...then slide this pad over it....not an easy thing to do for an old man!@@@ does not fit...impossible to move whole mattress ...
customer_reviews.author: sower

customer_reviews.title: A must have for dorm rooms
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter while she was in college three years ago. It held up all those years later and is now on her bed at home. It is washable and we dried it on low in the dryer. After being moved and laundered it is still in as good of a condition as it was when we first bought it. We did have a little trouble getting the mattress in there but it was in and zipped up it was fine. We did clean the mattress and let it air dry before putting the cover on the bed at the college.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Not breathable at all... false advertising
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a liner which kept dust mites and pollen out of our bed and although I am sure this would do that the one deal breaker is that there is no breathability to this item at all. When I say there is no breathability I mean 5psi across all fabric types and no airflow at all. The only exception I can think of is that the zipper isn’t air right but that is hardly the same as a “breathable membrane.” I will be returning promptly.
customer_reviews.author: S.G

customer_reviews.title: Zipper so cheap it broke one week after the 30 day return window. Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered on April 17th, today, one week past the return date, the zipper handle broke off and would not return-attach. It is a cheap zipper and poorly constructed and if you ever plan on washing this you’ll be sorry. It literally can’t hold up a month.
customer_reviews.author: Wyoming Telford

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed by this product. First, it’s very difficult to fit the entire mattress into the zippable protector. It literally required taking the entire mattress off the bed frame to fit the protector on. Then, when I went to wash it, the protector wrapped around my washing machine, making it necessary to cut it out so that my washing machine could be used again. Definitely not worth the cost or the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Hanslik

customer_reviews.title: Better than nothing but not worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: This cover was decent at the beginning but after 2 years it’s completely failed which means my actual bed has the stains. It also holds stains on the soft cover and they won’t wash out. I’ve had multiple expensive covers and this was fine for less than a year and I let it go for the remaining time just thinking it’s better than nothing. If you purchase thinking it’s better than nothing you have the right expectations but don’t expect it to actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Brian O.

customer_reviews.title: Great for our vacation rentals!
customer_reviews.text: We use these in our vacation rentals and so far we've had no complaints about them. Ones we've used in the past have been noisy when trying to sleep in the bed. It was very noticeable there was a cover on the bed, but these have been great! They have a fabric-like feel and are very quiet to sleep on. Very pleased and would recommend so far. We've haven't had any spillage so can't comment on that aspect. We've only had them a few months, but they seem very durable and the fit was great!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 2

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this to cover a large piece of memory foam to make a "camping bed" in the back of our truck. This is perfect. The price was very good, we appreciate the materials used, and even better - the ones that were not. It is soft to lay on as is, although we did put a fitted sheet right over it. It is very easy to wash and put back on. Once we recuperate from the holidays, we hope to get one for each of our actual mattresses in our home.
customer_reviews.author: VAS44

customer_reviews.title: Not for kids who are potty training.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 3 year olds new twin bed after he had his first accident in bed. But today he has another accident and peed through the cover, destroying the mattress. We have used this company in the past, but I wouldn’t recommend them again. Now I have to buy another mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Keno26

customer_reviews.title: I feel these are great mattress protectors
customer_reviews.text: I feel these are great mattress protectors. I have bought several to safe guard my mattress & memory foam. I like the "terry cloth feel" on the top surface and the waterproof feel of the rest. It has a strong zipper, with a velco tab to cover the end, when fully zipped. It is quiet to sleep on and fits my mattresses well! It washed & dried well--cool water & heat settings. I feel getting the right size & depth, for your mattress is important. Too large allows folds that could be a place for bed bugs to hide!
customer_reviews.author: N. C.

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT AND IS WATERPROOF!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing this for a bed. They are rough to get on with one person but soooooo worth it because it is COMPLETELY waterproof as well as it COMPLETELY protects the mattress! LOVE THIS and wish I would've gotten one when I first purchased my mattress! I will continue to buy this product whenever I get another mattress because it works so incredibly well!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great encasement. It is not the easiest thing to put on, so two people are helpful. Since you don’t have to remove it no problem. We don’t have bedbugs but we had them several years ago and it was a nightmare. I purchased a new mattress and wanted to protect my investment. A mattress pad is very helpful since the encasement is a little warm without it. It is quiet, no crinkling sounds at all. With a mattress cover you will protect it from needing laundry sooner than necessary. I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for an encasement.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Low Ceiling: Challenge Accepted
customer_reviews.text: I bought the queen size to fit my memory foam mattress. The directions got a good laugh out of me. You never realize how TALL a queen sized mattress is until you try to stand it up vertically. Yeah, it’s way too tall for my low ceiling. I was forced to improvise: Had to place the mattress flat on the bed frame and work it little bit by little bit. Was only able to pull this off because memory foam is easily bendable. And then I needed to enlist the help of family member to zip it up. I am NOT looking forward to when I need to wash it. The cover fit like a glove!
customer_reviews.author: AsDfGuy

customer_reviews.title: 100% PROTECTION!
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress protector! My cat decided to pee on my bed but, thank goodness I had this trusty protector in place! It has held up really well and I’ve washed it a multitude of times. Btw, the cat urine came out (thanks to the miracle pet odor remover). Anyway, this mattress protector works like charm AND it doesn’t seem to interfere with the coolness of our mattress. In other words, it hasn’t made me feel hotter with the protector ON.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGIA GIRL

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Would give 0 stars .... not waterproof after one wash ruined materess!$!#!@&&
customer_reviews.author: Jake T.

customer_reviews.title: Like plastic
customer_reviews.text: Definitely protects the mattress but it's impossible to sleep on without sweating feels like laying on plastic even with a sheet over it, it also slides alot!
customer_reviews.author: Welch Family

customer_reviews.title: don't listen to the reviews - terrible!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product! Cheaply made, knock-off brand with no customer service! I kept calling for several days, only as robotic answering machine. The zipper broke at first trial! Let me repeat- the zipper broke when I tried to put the protector on for the first time! don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Persiantiger

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the liquids out.
customer_reviews.text: I had it for a while. It has survived many accidents and washes. It completely covers the mattress so accidents can not enter through the sides. My mother has a tendency to have accidents will sitting on the side of the bed. Putting it on the mattress about as simple as it can be for an item that encases the mattress. If you can move the mattress against a wall, then rotate it over and zip it up then you will have no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Michael 71

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: incredibly disappointed by this product. we have a silverfish problem and noticed eggs in the crevices of our mattress, so we bought this to resolve this issue. We followed the instructions for installation. We double checked every inch of the mattress for any issues or possible rips. We had none. We still had a bug problem, and my gut told me to check the mattress protector. SURE ENOUGH, THEY CHEWED THEIR WAY OUT OF THE MATTRESS! BUYER BEWARE: DO NOT BUY THIS IF YOU ARE DEALING WITH INSECTS.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M de Haerne

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the SureGuard protector for two weeks now. The reason I bought it was because my mother also has the SureGuard mattress protector. It fits over my mattress with ease and can be washed once every two weeks. Regarding the material, I have a gel mattress that is supposed to cool down my body when sleeping. The material of the SureGuard is so thick it prevents me from feeling the coolness of the mattress gel. This can be a good, but also bad thing (depends on how you look at it). I have also bought SureGuard for my queen pillows! So I definitely recommend this company to help protect your bed.
customer_reviews.author: Brittni Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress encasement!
customer_reviews.text: The included instructions helped make installing the cover easy. I've used a dust mite proof cover on my mattress, box spring, and pillow for years, and it really makes a difference in my allergic reactions. This one had a slight plastic odor when it arrived, so I machine washed and dried it according to the instructions. Then there was no lingering odor. I really like the terry cloth upper surface; my mattress pad and sheets stay in place better than with my last one.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL !
customer_reviews.text: This item was soiled (black dots and brown dried up wet spots) and was unable to zip when I received it. I reached out to the company and haven’t received a response. I’m very dissatisfied with this purchase. I got the cover to eliminate bugs and this item brought more dirt and etc. to my home !!! i was not able to return this product because once i had it open n seen the condition i discarded it right away .
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: No issues with these covers
customer_reviews.text: There were no tears or seams that would allow anything to get in that I could find like i've seen mentioned for other brands of covers. It doesn't get hot, doesn't feel any different than before it was there IMO. Keep in mind using these covers alone are not a "magic cure" to a bug problem you have to use these alongside multiple other methods if that's why you're buying. Be sure to measure the depth of all mattresses before ordering don't assume "oh it's just standard size" or guess. We made that mistake with a few and had to return and re-order (which was handled fairly quickly by the company and well done).
customer_reviews.author: ChihuahuaMom

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Although it was left out of the description, you must remove the entire mattress from the bed, swing it around a bunch to have another adult man help you put the over on the mattress. I am an older lady and not a body builder. To follow the instructions I would need to muscled young men to help me put the cover on a California king mattress
customer_reviews.author: ArleenS

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: I bouth both the box spring and the mattress covers and they borh let me down. The whole purpose of these are to keep whatever may be inside inside but they both were poorly made and the seams did not hold up. The mattress seam came apart and the box spring seams must of been weak because bugs got through. I am very disappointed and would not recommend these at all!! Waste of money and they didn't do their job and made me have to spend even more money because they didn't do their job!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: WAY too large for a 13" mattress on adjustable bed.  Buy sheet clips to make it fit or it will constantly bunch under you.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for adjustable bed. I thought the encasement would prevent it from coming off the bed. The issue is that it is just too large. It was not easy to put on, which was a one time thing so I got over it. I bought sheet clips to tighten it on the underside which seems to have resolved the issue. I never had bed bug issues, so I can't comment on that aspect.. My mattresses are exactly 13" thick and there is a LOT of spare material. Without the clips, this would be a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Focus and Form Fitness

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Many covers for mattresses, box springs, and bases are basically like putting a mattress inside a large bag, which means that they sag at the bottom under the bed, and touch the floor, allowing whatever might live on the floor or crawls around down there to migrate up into the bed, as for example, bugs, molds, fungus, or dust mites. This cover is made with 6 side panels, so it fits properly without drooping down onto the floor under the bed. I machine wash it in cold water and let it air dry by hanging it up, but you can also follow the manufacturer's laundering instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: I have a mattress that has a satin fabric and my sheets constantly slip off. I wanted a cover just to keep my sheets from slipping and this totally worked. I use it with a 3in Tempupedic topper. the topper stays in place and my sheets no longer slip off. Made of good materials, and I will assume it's water resistant. Being waterproof and airtight, it does have a tendancy to hold in air as well. When you sit/lay on the bed, the rest of the bed is like a balloon until the air escapes the zipper area, I guess. I tried to open the zipper more to minimize this but it didn't work. Not a big deal though.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for 3 months. Bought an adjustable split king bed. The mattress that came with the bed was too firm. Problem solved with this product. I have no pressure when sleeping at night. I wish that I purchased the 1" product instead because it is hard to move around in the bed now because I sink in the mattress once I'm in it. Man I've never slept so well in my life. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this mattress protector does everything it’s intended for.. BUT I do not recommend. It completely changes the feel of the mattress. We have decided to use this protector for when we move so everything is covered seeing how we have a new tempur pedic mattress.. it took our mattress from a MEDIUM to an EXTRA FIRM mattress. It does not let memory foam type mattresses conform to your body. There’s no room to stretch or bend it would honestly barely make a dent when you would sit. Again, for what it’s intended for it’s great at preserving the mattress, just not worth compromising your overall comfort in my opinion. Needs improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Matos

customer_reviews.title: Get the 12-16"
customer_reviews.text: If you have a 11, or 12 inch pocket height mattress get the 12-16", because this will give your cover wiggle room- whereas it won't be so tight as running the risk of tearing. However saying that, the material is nice, with a strong bi weave and the seams appear to be pretty well sewn. I would only wash this in a Front Loader, because a top load agitator will tear this cover to shreds
customer_reviews.author: LMG

customer_reviews.title: My Comments
customer_reviews.text: Zipper works well and is easy to install especially if you have a bed with head and foot section that elevates. It does not slide on the velcro which is a great benefit. It is quite large but covers everything. Material is great, strong and seems very durable. Material on top is aslightly slippery,therefore corners of sheet attempt to slide off at top. This is only complaint; otherwise, it is an great and quality made cover. I am pleased I purchased and will work on method to keep sheets on top corners!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Briefly:
customer_reviews.text: First, take the time to read the directions on how to put on. We did and we were glad of it. I am sure it saved us time in the end. Do mind the air pocket message in the directions, air will get trapped. We have two very large dogs who share the bed and this is a must item. Loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Edie V

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love the coverage & the cottony top, no plastic sounds when I move. The only mistake on my part was I should have purchased the 13-16 inch deep, 17-20 is too big but I made it work with rubber bands underneath. I did measure 🤔 oh well, next time will purchase correct depth. It’s easy to put on, the way it’s zippered there’s no need to take the entire mattress off the bed which saves your back from possible injury.
customer_reviews.author: Joan S.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of the cover. Kind of awakward to put on by myself.. but "do-able". I've used less expensive or just plain cheap covers in the past. I wish I had just put the money into this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Denise L.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price for protection
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey but worth it for us. We kept a mattress in storage for 4 months with this on. When we retrieved the mattress and took off the other protective covers, we were impress with the way it protected out mattress. No musty oders or dampness at all. We took off the SureGuard cover and washed it and put it back on the mattress and it is still working as intended. I am alergic to dust mites and have to use a cover like this to eliminate sneezing. No sneezing over a year later...it works very well!
customer_reviews.author: gr8mom

customer_reviews.title: Heavy mattresses need two people to install, but good product
customer_reviews.text: I gave this mattress bag cover five stars for easy to install, but that would be for two persons. For one person installing on a queen sized TempurPedic mattress, it was like being dragged around by a stubborn farm animal. The cover looks great and is as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Cyburbs

customer_reviews.title: Mattress all snuggled
customer_reviews.text: Wanted my daughters mattress to clean and every fitted sheet kept falling off not only because the mattress is 12" think but because she is a sleeper that moves all over the place. We put the SureGuard on and it was great, large enough and zippered all up. very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest and best mattress protector I have ever owned. It stretches and is very soft. Fits my 11" mattress perfectly and I think it would fit a 12" mattress also since it has stretch and it advertised 9-12. It might be a little baggy on a 9" since you can see from the photo how very well it fits a 11". High quality fabric and very nice zipper closing. I highly recommend this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G.

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Broke
customer_reviews.text: The material is good and it protects one's mattress. The only issues i have is the zipper quality. The zipper broker while zipping it up for the 1st time. So when i had to clean the cover - i could no longer use the product because i could not zip it back up. If zipper quality was better - i would give more stars
customer_reviews.author: gtorres

customer_reviews.title: Best protection for a bed
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic protection against bugs, dust, and spills. Is NOT crinkly at all, and doesn’t change the feel of the bed at all. We have had so many spills that have been kept away from our mattress, saved it on many occasions, and it keeps on going. Washes easily and helps a lot with allergies!
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: full mattress protection
customer_reviews.text: this is a great product as far as water resistance and durability go. It is a huge pain to install as it zips around the entire mattress so the mattress has to come off the bed to put it on/remove. Also the fit is a little baggy so it takes some manipulation during sheet changes to get it tight by pulling it down in certain areas.
customer_reviews.author: Jada

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this protector quickly after buying my king size mattress. My partner wants a 1in memory foam so I thought I may have to exchange this protector for one that fits a bigger mattress. But I was happy to see that this product has some stretch to it and is a little loose so I can still use it with a thin memory foam. Went on mattress very easily with two people, one on each side.
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: 100% mattress protection that makes no noise
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new memory foam mattress and was looking for a protective cover that would protect my investment. After comparing a few different models on Amazon, I settled on SureGuard's product. Aside from the obvious protection against spills/stains, I wanted something that would not make any noise when shifting in bed and I this product does not disappoint. I do not even notice that the protective cover is there and can sleep with the peace of mind knowing it's well protected. Would definitely recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: not a true fit, unhappy create folds and doesn't fit well.
customer_reviews.text: unhappy, too large for xl twin bed. slips and slides under sheets creating folds under me. Uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: Mattress Will Be Protected From Wetness
customer_reviews.text: How do you review something you hope never has to be tested? I bought this because I do sweat when I sleep (yes ladies, I am single), and since my last mattress protector disintegrated a few years ago, I noticed yellowish areas near where my head and shoulders are. This will definitely keep that from continuing and and more if need be. I do like the zipper more then the fitted style I had last time.
customer_reviews.author: E. Leopold

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Its been 2 months since I purchased this to replace my existing one. At first I was apprehensive as it weighed much less than the previous one. It fit well and was easy to install. Then I had a minor leak from the ceiling which went unnoticed for many hours.The bed sheet was quite wet so my instinct was to check the mattress and I was relieved that the mattress was dry. So it held up to water proof. I am a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Rasquinha

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Brought this to protect my new mattress which is about 8.5 inches thick (I have Bob’s Gem queens mattress for reference). I wasn’t sure if I should get the 9-12” one but glad I got the 6-8”. It was a bit hard to slip onto the mattress but overall it a tight fitting which is good. As for being waterproof, a small amount of water is okay but when your kid spills a bottle of water, it does go thru a little onto the mattress
customer_reviews.author: Morello

customer_reviews.title: Faulty zipper!
customer_reviews.text: I just put this on my bed and the zipper came right off. I don't have superhuman strength. So now I guess it has to stay on forever.
customer_reviews.author: Erinruth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use full mattress protection
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on, smooth and soft surface for the bed, fits my 8" mattress perfectly, there's even a cover for the zipper head to keep it from being snagged. I am using this under a waterproof fitted sheet on a bed for my four year old to protect the mattress completely if there are nighttime accidents - I learned the hard way with my older son that sometimes those accidents can go past the waterproof top of that fitted sheet, and had to buy a whole new mattress...
customer_reviews.author: DMC

customer_reviews.title: Durable and tested
customer_reviews.text: It has served its purpose well for us and has withstood MANY washes already. I would love to have bought a second to have on hand but the price point prevented me from doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Orrell

customer_reviews.title: No Strikes on the Batter!
customer_reviews.text: Hello! I have 3 Minature Pinchers that often share the bed; two have just reached one year old and the third is a senior that sometimes has bladder problems. The youngsters provide an issue where they constantly want to dig into the mattress; the senior... well, you know. I *needed* an encasement because past mattress toppers were either torn-through too easily or didn't have deep enough pockets to keep on the mattress - let alone preventing fluids from penetrating the upper surface. Thus far this encasement has worked marvelously. We've only had one peed bed experience so far - but this mattress encasement stopped it. "So far so good!' :-) Respectfully Yours,
customer_reviews.author: PostToastie

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much we bought 3!
customer_reviews.text: Got a new mattress and our fitted sheets were too large so my husband and I decided to check out this product. We bought 2 and they fit so perfectly to our mattress we decided to but 1 more. No idea if it is water resistant yet but its nice that it goes around my entire mattress and zips. No longer have to worry about it popping off the sides of our mattress when sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you plan on moving your mattress/boxspring, beware, these will rip.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the idea of this product. I wish the cover was more durable, though. When you have a bedbug problem, you check your mattress and boxsprings daily. With moving the mattress and boxspring, the materials tore. Now we have covers covered in duct tape. Sure, if your bed frame has sharp edges, you would expect a snag if you're not careful. We have these protectors on our box springs AND mattress, so there is no reason the underside of the mattress (touching the box spring) should get a hole in it, as it's only touching the same type of fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The bed is a full-sized adjustable bed. Very easy to put on, if you read the directions first. The terry cloth side faces up. 5 minutes by myself and the mattress was covered. Water-resistant, yes from first hand experience. Wipes clean and dry.It is not a product that makes one feel warm or sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress pad!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this pad for protecting from snuggly sleepovers with our 2 yo grandson who sometimes has accidents in the night. He loves to sleep in our big bed but I was stressed about our brand new mattress. This pad has solved that problem! Not noisy like some I’ve tried in the past either. Very comfy and no crinkle noises!
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: I love how this mattress encasement fits the mattress
customer_reviews.text: I love how this mattress encasement fits the mattress. I like the top part its slightly paded. BUT it is not 100% waterproof. My daughter had an accident and it soaked thru the mattress pad, the bed sheets and wet the top part of the encasement making it wet my new mattress. For the price it needs to do what it says. I reached out to the company and they were nice enough to give me a discount for my future purchase but its ok by then I had purchased other less pricey encasements. Great encasement though. Just not right for a family with toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyov5

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: The product was a good fit. I don’t think it’s worth 50 dollars, more like 20. I bought two, thinking they would be waterproof. Sadly they’re the least waterproof encasement I’ve ever saw. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Laresha

customer_reviews.title: It takes 2-3 people to get it off and on
customer_reviews.text: Great product if you don’t live alone! Since it goes on like a couch cushion and not a fitted sheet; it is difficult to get it off and on without calling someone to come help due to the weight of the mattress. It’s next to impossible to do alone. Plus no matter what you do there is always like an air bubble trapped inside after it’s on the bed and zipped up.
customer_reviews.author: britt

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd or 4th buy, my last mattress was smaller, I like the full incasement because it fits perfect and you don’t have to worry about it coming off. I like the sheet one because it is easier to put on by yourself. They work great though whichever you go with, but you have to follow directions on washing and drying. Heat will kill the water proofing part of it. But for the price I just replace it once a year and not worry about it. Other run hot this one we don’t have that problem, it’s the only brand we use now.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Foss

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a dream! I ordered this encasement cover for my king sized mattress 2 months ago. It arrived on time and was packaged solidly. That very weekend, I put it on my mattress and it was perfect. Not too tight like other covers I've tried, it was easy to put on and I loved that it has a nice velcro cover to hide the zipper. 2 months out and I'm still a huge fan! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: M. Bunton

customer_reviews.title: Best one we've found!
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is a smaller fit option for our 6 inch bunk bed mattresses. All other covers are huge. We have two mattresses but I bought only one cover to start and see how we liked it. Going to order another one! Wish they were a little less cost wise, but that's ok. Wanted a full encasement for the mattresses that was mostly free of toxins, soft, liquid resistant/waterproof (in case of accidents with the kiddos!), allergen and bed bug proof and this is the best one found by far! Not noisy at all. Super easy to put on. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: achancock

customer_reviews.title: Full enclosure with no vinyl or plastic sounds.
customer_reviews.text: After trying another encasement, I decided I wanted something that provided protection without knowing it was on the mattress. This one delivered. It fits on my thick queen mattress very well and completely zips closed with a small cloth flap to cover the zipper as well. While moving around on the mattress, it does not sound like there's a protector on it at all. I have washed this a couple of times and have not noticed any extra wearing or tearing. I imagine it would be much easier with two people to slip it on the mattress, but it is possible with only one person.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Protects the mattress satisfactorily
customer_reviews.text: This encasement mattress protector was easy to fit over the twin size, moderately lightweight mattress. As of this writing it has not been subjected to liquid. I keep two layers of bed sheet pads over the encasement. The fit is a bit loose, but satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Ozark Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best price for a bedbug cover to fit a Queen-sized Holmsbu
customer_reviews.text: My criteria for a mattress guard were very simple - had to be certified bedbug proof (we live in a very old apartment) and it had to fit our monster mattress, our 16"-deep Queen-sized Holmsbu from Ikea. Beautiful beast of a mattress, but it was nearly impossible to find a cover that would fit that wasn't $300. After about an hour of googling all the covers that would ship to Canada, this was the best price, and it fits very well. It still took two people to put the dang thing on, but our mattress is also over a hundred pounds, so I don't fault the mattress cover. It will be nice to sleep easy at night knowing it's protected.
customer_reviews.author: maddissimo

customer_reviews.title: It is necessary to have help to put this cover on your mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I love the mattress protector. However, it is impossible to put it on by your self. You will need help and will need to actually stand the mattress up to install the protector. It is also very difficult to tell the starting point on the cover. To be honest, I have not got it on my bed yet.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Brown

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable !!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put on the mattress and fits really well. Very comfortable no crunchiness under it ....it is very soft!
customer_reviews.author: M. Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Queen size is too big for a regular queen mattress
customer_reviews.text: Since I put the cover on the mattress that had signs of bed bugs, no one has slept on it but we do not have bedbugs in the house now. The only drawback I noticed is that the cover doesn’t fit snuggly which might be an issue once we start use the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Richter

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly as described and was easy to put on the mattress. So far so good after about a month of use. No wears or tears. I haven’t spilled any liquid on it and I don’t intend to so I can’t speak on its ability to be waterproof at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to install. It took one minute to put on without any struggle. It’s durable and water resistant, as well. I’m very happy with this product, so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. The zipper is particularly good quality. I was worried that the material on top might make it hot at night. Have not noticed a difference, at all. And because we travel quite a lot, I really appreciate the extra peace of mind. We have friends that have had to fight bed bugs and we hope to never have to go through that. These encasements, along with some other precautions, will hopefully keep us from having to do so.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaNOLA

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it for a long time, but so far the quality seems durable. It fit our mattress perfectly and we like the full encasement of our mattress. We had just a fitted protector for our last mattress and it always bunched up, so far this one hasn't. It isn't as easy to put on as the fitted one, but we didn't find it too hard to place on our mattress. However, it was easier with more than one person.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on by myself, and I was 7 months pregnant. The zippered opening is very large so you can slide the encasement under your mattress. I was pleasantly surprised at how easy it was because we have a very deep mattress and I was afraid it would be too tight. Fits well. The only improvment I would want is a heavier duty zipper. But I don't plan to take it off/on too often so it shouldn't be a problem. I washed it first and it washed well- took a loooooong time to dry on delicate/air cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Demos

customer_reviews.title: First Experience with Protecting a Split CAL King Mattress
customer_reviews.text: This matress protector was rather difficult to put it on the mattress; however I managed. It is larger than the mattress which is a plus. I really like that it protects against most allergens, bugs, and of course, accidential soiling of the mattress. We had one small spill since we put the matress cover on, and nothing got on the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Mare0816

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: With a new 3" memory foam topper on the california king mattress, I dreaded putting on a new casing. Last one was a horror show to get on and the old topper would slide around. This case went on easy and zipped up nice and snug. I was amazed!
customer_reviews.author: Murph

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to anyone who wants a good quality cover ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this on my sons new bed for about a week now but he hasn’t leaked through to know if it is truly waterproof. Definitely make sure you have two people to put this on the mattress otherwise it can be quite difficult. It was true to size so make sure you measure how deep the mattress is. I’ll be buying the fitted mattress cover to go over it just to save the hassle of removing the encasement when he does finally leak over. I would recommend this to anyone who wants a good quality cover without feeling like you’re rolling around on plastic
customer_reviews.author: TLM

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I expected !
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought mattress covers before but this one actually encases the entire mattress which is a pain to get on but better than just covering the top like a mattress cover would. It’s a little big but that’s my fault for not double checking my mattress size I just tuck in the extra material ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Firmer but ok
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this matress cover to help protect a new memory foam topper I had bought prior to buying this one. It was, however, a challenge to put on. However, before putting on the cover, the memory foam topper was very soft. After putting on the cover, it made it somewhat firm. I guess making it firmer won't hurt in exchange for the protection it provides against water and all sorts of things. Overall, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: G-MAR

customer_reviews.title: One step of many
customer_reviews.text: Works great! No more bed bug bites. Treated the entire bed frame-we have 2x2 bay of drawers on either side, headboard, storage space underneath. So it took A LOT OF WORK to get rid of them-Expect that. Do your research, they can live in more places than you'd expect. 2 Month Update. Mattress encasement is holding up well, including a move to a bigger house, and two little ones in diapers. Most importantly though, no more bed bugs. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress Protector for 5 Inch Mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress protector. I needed this for a 5 inch mattress that came with a rollaway/foldable bed. I washed it in cold water on hand wash cycle, dry on low. It fits great! There is stretch in it for a few more inches, but it fits perfect without the stretch. I would buy this again!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, no noise
customer_reviews.text: Was amazingly easy to install, and the best thing was compared to other that it does not make any plastic noise when moving on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: We have a king size bed with a pillow top, we needed the extra deep pockets, plus we put a memory foam on top of that, it fit it all!!
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: Deep pockets and well made zippers
customer_reviews.text: We initially bought one to see how it was. Once we put it on, we knew it was the nicest one we’ve found. My husband has allergies and it seems to have helped on that front but the part I like is the exceptional fit. We ended up buying another for our guest room mattress. Great fit!
customer_reviews.author: BobBobAff

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY EVERYTHING LEAKS THRU!! Tried to return it as of I didn't not wash it since I bough it but nope they didn't not want to return it!!! 😡😡😡😡😡
customer_reviews.author: Rosbel Gutierrez jr

product_meta.title: Queen (13-16 in. Deep) SureGuard Mattress Encasement - 100% Waterproof, Bed Bug Proof, Hypoallergenic - Premium Zippered Six-Sided Cover
feature_bullets: 100% Waterproof - Six-sided premium mattress protector blocks perspiration, bed wetting, liquids and stains; 10-year quality guarantee (NOTE: For frequent accidents and easy clean-ups, place a fitted SureGuard Mattress Protector over the encasement).
Bed Bug Proof - Super fine zipper with Invisi-Zip and SureSeal technology completely seals off the mattress from bed bugs - use with a SureGuard Box Spring Encasement
Hypoallergenic - Blocks dust mites, allergens, bacteria, mildew and mold - use with SureGuard Pillow Protectors
Soft & Noiseless - 100% cotton terry top; Wicks away moisture; Retains the feel of your mattress - Free from Vinyl, PVC, Phthalates, fire retardants and other toxic chemicals
Queen (60 in x 80 in) - Fits 13 to 16 inches deep; Zippered Mattress Encasement - Machine wash and dry. Independently lab tested and GREENGUARD Gold certified.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars5,106 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: SureGuard warrants to the owner of each its products that if the laminate, fabric or zipper becomes damaged within a period of 10 years from the date of purchase as a result of normal household use, SureGuard will replace the protector provided the care instructions have been followed. The warranty covers the protector product only. Purchase receipt must be retained and presented to validate the warranty. For commercial purchases
